website_summaries.verdict: While you'll love this model's modern looks and performance, the price may make you want to check out other options on our list.
pros: Impresses with its ultra-modern looks and side-draft ventilation that keeps cooking odors and fumes out of your way while using your range
Fits neatly under a cabinet while mounting to a wall
cons: Customer service could be more attentive

website_summaries.verdict: One of the higher quality range hoods available for online purchase, this attractive piece is sure to impress.
pros: Offers a touch screen for ultimate accessibility along with 3 speed settings
Double fan system for ultimate power
cons: A few buyers had issues with the company's customer service

customer_reviews.title: READ ME FIRST before buying!
customer_reviews.text: Unit comes as the picture shown. Two blowers inside are silent with 6 inch vent opening. But the package is not coming with necessary accessories for installation. Especially if you plan to install it against the wall, all accessories in the manual need to be purchased separately and they are not listed anywhere before purchasing. Even the suspension needed for avoiding unit shaking when installing it against the wall. Those accessories are coming in vent cover ( FOTILE Home Decor Flue-Extension )availble for another $100+. And they are if you dont purchase ahead, you have to reverse all the installation works previously.
customer_reviews.author: SwingTiger

customer_reviews.title: Overall It is the best range hood I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Overall It is the best range hood I've ever used. Powerful suction: the oil smoke is not noticeable anymore in the kitchen; low level noise: I am not sure if it the quietest one but I can hear people talking when it is on; stylish looking: it fits the cabinets perfectly. I strongly recommend it to my friends around.
customer_reviews.author: Qian Shen

customer_reviews.title: Except the expensive installation fee we have to pay - ...
customer_reviews.text: Except the expensive installation fee we have to pay - after read all reviews we decided have someone installed it for us, the product works very well. We feel much ease during cooking right now. A little bit noisy, but understandable. Only issue is the installation, can the company figure out a standard way for customers? We already have all vent and pipes be installed previously, hanging this stuff cost us more than $200. Our friend who is also interested about this product, get a quote of more than $1000 because they do not have pipes pre-installed.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: And it is pretty! Very glad to use
customer_reviews.text: The range hood is powerful and quite. And it is pretty! Very glad to use. This is one of the most reliable and trustworthy brand in Asian.
customer_reviews.author: wei.yang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing industrial design and VERY easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product ! Amazing industrial design and VERY easy to install ! Simple process to maintain. Beautiful touch screen ! Especially it works perfect ! I LOVE it !
customer_reviews.author: Yan Li

customer_reviews.title: fairly easy installation. plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: Installed yesterday, fairly easy installation. plenty of power. looks good, the lights are very bright. the only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is that this is a replacement so no need for the up-to-ceiling kit, but still need 2 screws and the 2 rubber shoes on the back side. Those are not included in the Its basic package. Had to run out to find them. It costs less than 2 dollars, For a $1,200 hood, I'd throw it in there just in case it is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star!!!!! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love FOTILE range hood!!!! Powerful but quiet. the best part is the fashional design. Recommended for all families!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Xipeng Chen

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull fan and stylish design
customer_reviews.text: This is a new design of range hood that features "side suction" instead of top suction. It has a 256 watt fan motor, which works well to get rid of vapor and fume in my open style kitchen., Easy installation and stylish apperance. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product, slick design!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product. Got it during BF, still not cheap. The power of the motors are not the biggest on the market, but the design really helps the performance. I don’t see any smoke getting away. Also it looks much better than competing products. Finally, the sound is not bad at all even on high setting. One minor suggestion is to change the light bulb color to a warmer color, that would make food more appealing! I would definitely recommend this product, very solid job Fotile!
customer_reviews.author: Natte

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking range hood
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on line at the advise of a friend. Many Asian-American families own this Fotile JQG7501 30" model range hood. The unit has plenty of suction power, very quite compared to our old "Happy Mama" Pacair, unit we owned for 10 years. A Fotile range hood will definitely upgrade your kitchen area. Only down side is finding contractor to install unit in a smaller town. Take pictures of the unit & show to contractor's before ordering the unit. This unit is made in People's Republic of China, ours shipped (free) from California. We received it in a box that was packed very well. NO damage to box or unit!
customer_reviews.author: bluegrass2012

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit to replace our under counter mounted microwave / hoodfan. The microwave was so hard to keep clean and this unit looked like it would preform better as an over the cook top vent. If you follow the links to the site the installation is exactily as the video shows. We completed our install in about 2 hours. The only trouble we had placing the unit was the need to drill holes as our back splash is full tile in the cook top area. Its a great product, fully worth the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John M Jones

customer_reviews.title: The suction power is very weak, I can barely feel it.
customer_reviews.text: It cost me 300 more to get someone to install it. However it’s not working well at all. The kitchen gets so Smokey and I cough a lot when I fry things. I am quite disappointed with something so costly but not working.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking range hood
customer_reviews.text: I bought this range hood in 36in model and so far we like it. We like the looking most: the exterior is in piano-black color and looks stylish. The top wing rotates up when in use, giving us a feel of futurist. The built-in LED lights are bright. The suction power is around 500 cfm, actually not top-notch in this price tier, but already good enough for daily use. Would recommend professional installation on the 36in model, because the range hood is very heavy and requires drilling holes at precise location.
customer_reviews.author: P. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great range hood, easy to maintain. But parts and installation instructions not as good.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this range hood for 1 year now. It works great and I would purchase it again. It is strong, and easy to clean (removing filter, washing it, and placing it back in). The LED light provides ample lighting. My only complaint was that the unit didn't include the decorative plate. In the installation video and installation guide, it says a decorative plate is included, but it isn't. This made installing our range hood more difficult as it would have been much easier for our installation with the plate. Also, at the time of purchase, the decorative plate wasn't being sold.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Strong but quiet!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a well known brand for a reason! We have an open kitchen and needed a strong range hood, and this has exceeded our expectations! It is so powerful that when I shake peppers, I could see the pepper flakes being sucked upward! And it was only on the lowest setting!
customer_reviews.author: Snowie

customer_reviews.title: I am dispoint with it
customer_reviews.text: Missing screws that i can't install it. I have to spend a lot of time to look for screws from homedepot.
customer_reviews.author: WuYu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for extreme cooking kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I have the range hood for 6 months now and it works very good. After had couple different ranges hood in my house not thing seen work. I look in all the the reviews of all different ranges hood. And find this one and see the video so I bought it. Oh boy I love it and very one in my family love it too. It is look futuristic and works very good for our family. See the video I posted and you know. LOL barbecue in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: chuong hoang

customer_reviews.title: Solid hood for Chinese cooking
customer_reviews.text: With the purchase of my townhouse, I was stuck with a microwave/hood combo, which does not perform well for Chinese cooking. So far, I have had less fumes floating around my kitchen, and the oil droplets that permeated my cabinets now get sucked through. That's really all I can ask for!
customer_reviews.author: jgu

customer_reviews.title: Very high quiliaty
customer_reviews.text: you cannot smell your cooking at upstairs anymore after you install this boy, this is need a professional installation, you better ask a professional contractor to do it, except you are the one. It's ez to control and ez to clean, and help your cooking go with professional way, haha, both my wife and me we love this. you pay what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Gao

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a year very easy to clean good look in my kitchen,led light broke few month ago.contact customer service they sent me a new led light, easy replace, hopefully this time everything function well.
customer_reviews.author: YYYbaby

customer_reviews.title: good looking and powerful range hood
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this almost a year ago but waited to see how it works before writing my review. This range hood had not failed to meet my expectation. Pros - Good looking - Powerful with good design (I feel the sloped and triangular shape helped directing the flow) - Intuitive controls - Easy to clean (filter can be taken out and washed in dish washer) - Fotile support (accessible via wechat) Cons - Expensive
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good suction and design!
customer_reviews.text: One side was dented on arrival and that could be be reason causing the grille (or “front filter”) to bend a little which gets in the way of the retractable cover arm. I had to straighten the grille a little in order to make clearance for the arm to retract without making any noise. It’s all fine. All these problems won’t affect its function. The dents can’t be seen from the front. Overall, good suction and the design really help the air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean! And very useful. Looking for a new hood highly recommend this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Xiuli ni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fashionable model and strong power.it’s real work to solve my kitchen cooking problem.my mummy loves it.over five star review.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshiny face

customer_reviews.title: This thing SUCKS, in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth every penny. We stir fry a lot and this thing prevents oil from gathering on the ceiling. I used to have to disconnect the smoke detector when searing steaks, but now no smoke escapes!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! It did cost you a good amount of money but I’ll say all worth it! We fried a steak to test, high heat, heavy smoke, but all smoke are sucked away instantly. Second floor, you can not smell any thing, first floor near stove you will notice smell but NO SMOKE AT ALL. Definitely a go for families love cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Installed yesterday and used for two cooking, it is great product. Easy to install, working great definitely doing it job sucking air/smoke with 900CFM and 6” pipe. Plus, nice looking, quiet or no louder than my previous indoor circulation overhead hood. Btw, suggest to find a qualified and experienced contractor for installation, and use good quality pipe, tape, duct door, etc. Overall, cannot be more happy with it. Will provide follow up review down the road
customer_reviews.author: Mingkun Sun

customer_reviews.title: Worth my every dollar investment
customer_reviews.text: Let's talk about Chinese kitchens. We have a completely different cooking style than Americans, which involves tons of frying, oil, and stains. Fotilen JQG7501 definitely meets my needs, absorbing oil fast and leaving stains nowhere, let alone the slick design, much like hanging a piano on your kitchen wall. 100% recommend! Don't forgot to take advantage of the Black Friday deal, $300 off
customer_reviews.author: Yi Lu

customer_reviews.title: and it worked great. Best purchase in my house ever
customer_reviews.text: My mom has been using this brand since long time ago. Now I bought one for my own house, and it worked great. Best purchase in my house ever. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: powerful range hood
customer_reviews.text: the range hood is very powerful which is exactly what i wanted. However the screws are not included in the original package....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and even better service! I needed to contact the customer service for a minor issue of the panel that opens and closes, and the service manager Mr. Li was very responsive and got the issue fixed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This thing is legit. Best range hood I've ever seen and owned. We also got the extension which was good looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Wenjie Gao

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design, form AND function!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, great look and operates exactly as we hoped! A little bummed that you have to spend an ADDITIONAL $250 for the vent covers, seems excessive. The amount of suction is excellent! Make sure to use rigid ducting though or the noise level is muuch higher (with flex ducting).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction power with a sleek look
customer_reviews.text: I love love my new range hood! Now when I cook, I don’t even smell the scent of my food. The suction power is very strong. And I like the bright light too. My kitchen is not well lighted. A bright light above the range is exactly what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love all aspects of it. Superb suction power and super easy to clean. It looks really elegant and smart in my kitchen! Love the delayed power off too!
customer_reviews.author: Feng Jin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product, really glad to buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this Fotile range hood during the Amazon prime day sale, and received it one week later. My husband installed right away all by himself, really easy to install. If you already have the 6 inches ventilation duct, you don't need to hire a contractor. The suction power is really great, and also very quiet, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: The best range I ever have.
customer_reviews.text: It fits best with my kitchen. My parents like it very much. The suction power is enough for cooking. Looks very perfect! Also easily maintenance, and easily clean. The part of the range can be put into the washer, therefore we clean it every week!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great consumer service! Just bought a JQG7501 and I can't wait to try it!
customer_reviews.author: zuhui

customer_reviews.title: Hood fit perfect above stove
customer_reviews.text: Hood fit perfect above stove. It was easy to install - I was able to install by myself. It is very quiet and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: mmiPhone7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great range hood, got in on sale for $999. It costs $200 for installation, but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jun d cai

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to replace our weaker hood that came with the house as we do a lot of cooking with oils & other strong-smelling ingredients. I’ve had my eye on this one for a while & finally made the purchase - we are very pleased with the product & how strong the suction is; no more unpleasant/oily smells in our home! Customer service was great as well; we had some issues when installing it & they talked us right through the process on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Wen xiu Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great product with powerful suction!
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is great for Chinese style of cooking in kitchen, which generates a lot of grease and oil-smoke. It is better than other popular brands on the markets. One thing that might be good for manufacturers to consider is adding side screens at top of the hood to keep more oil-smoke within the range.
customer_reviews.author: STLYU

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: The best range hood on the market. Good suction power and fairly quiet. Looks good in the modern kitchen. Little pricey but it’s a long time investment.
customer_reviews.author: co2smoke

customer_reviews.title: Good product but expensive installation fee
customer_reviews.text: We noticed that this brand is one of the top notch in china! I got one for my own place, then I got the second one for my mom on Mother’s Day. Just wait until it hit 999$ for purchase. Can’t wait to install it this weekend. One complaint is the installation fee is so high that almost half price of this vacuum hood! I wish I can grand a free installation! Otherwise, the first one in my kitchen is doing a good job when cooking something is oily and smell!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Sun

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great service. We are so glad we finally found what we want for a long time. It is really powerful but not very noisy with fashion design. And I would like to mention that the customer service is great. Mr. Dong gave us professional answers to all our questions and concerns.
customer_reviews.author: clara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Deluxe look and very efficient! Keep my kitchen always clean!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Chen

customer_reviews.title: good service
customer_reviews.text: I like the service of fo FOTILE! I lived in WA state, when I call FOTILE international service, FOTILE gave me the phone number of Sun. He only needs 2 hours to install. The fans of FOTILE much better than American brands, and easy to clean. I will advice my friend buy FOTILE.
customer_reviews.author: yuzhou zou

customer_reviews.title: Really impressive around-round range hood.
customer_reviews.text: Having been using this beauty more than 3 weeks now. It really sucks ! It's so powerful sometimes I have problem to notice the food is burned. Me and My wife really prefer this sleek look, It matches my black range cooker so well and very easy to clean with the glass surface. It's pricy but it's a very good bang for the buck for me. The family love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Best machine for Chinese
customer_reviews.text: The best machine for Chinese style kitchen. I used it for some time, no more oil on the roof of kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: SUNNY

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stylish range hood for cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great range hood, especially for cooking Chinese food. The fan is powerful but is not too aloud. We have used it for a month now and really like it. It looks stylish fitting very well with other appliances in our kitchen. The customer service is great and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended to hire a pro to install for you
customer_reviews.text: It was already tbh. Pretty strong hood but the install is difficult. Highly recommended hire pros to install it for you. And you need to buy extra parts.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Now the light not work
customer_reviews.text: I spent one thousand to buy this a range hood . And is hasn't been for 2years ! Now the light not work???? ?????
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about a year ago. I asked my friend to install it. Pros: -easy to clean -good looking -very powerful suction -love the extend time off feature Cons: -too expensive -easy to leave fingerprints
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have an open kitchen and I cook Chinese food a lot, which this range hood, I can't even smell anything about the cooking food in the living room. Very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Guangming Mao

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product that keeps our kitchen nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product that keeps our kitchen nice and clean. Installation team and customer support team are easy to communicate, overall a great job. I will recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Modern look and good features.
customer_reviews.text: Very modern look, and good features. I really like this automatically door closed function.
customer_reviews.author: jk_21

customer_reviews.title: THE best range hood you could purchase anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first review for purchase on Amazon, and I feel obligated to recommend this hood because this hood worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Yunliang Zhao

customer_reviews.title: i love it very
customer_reviews.text: The machine have large suction,I can cook fish or meat ,I don’t worry the fume running in the house,it’s profession.i love it very much
customer_reviews.author: lin cong

customer_reviews.title: The range works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The ranges functions really well. The suction was very strong and extracted all of the smoke out of the house. I will recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: WeiWang

customer_reviews.title: Nice product from China
customer_reviews.text: got it yesterday and asked expert ppl to install it , it’s really nice gonna try to use it tomorrow, shipment is good nothing broken!
customer_reviews.author: sujianrong

customer_reviews.title: I in loved with it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this range for myself in Jan. I in loved with it. Therefore, I introduced and ordered one for my friend for gift this month. When she opened the box, the range was all cracked. The glass was all over and she even got a cut on her hand. That’s why I had to sent it back. Now I am reordering the new one to send her. Please please please make sure to send her a good one. It was very embarrassing. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: annie huang

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, very easy to use. The best is very easy to clean. Great customer service, give responses right away. They helped me correct the installation and fix issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jinghao Li

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Works great for Chinese cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about 2 months now.... it’s quiet, it looks amazing, it’s strong, it’s great with Asian cooking..... did I mention how great it looks? :)
customer_reviews.author: Valen dolce

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine. However, I had a hard time registering my product online. I filled out all the blanks online but could not submit the registration from because of a "channels can not be empty!" message. Tried multiple times without luck. Called customer service number showed on fotileglobal.com and found that number didn't work also...
customer_reviews.author: Wenfeng Peng

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This range hood was purchased at the end of May and has been in use for several months. It's not as quiet as I thought, but it's a lot quieter than the one I used before. This range hood is powerful. What attracts me the most is its design, which is more fashionable. Let me decide to give a five-star rating because of its after-sales service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it at a discount price! Still waiting for the kitchen remodel to finish. But I have used this in China. It was awesome in the look and the power! Way better than the US range hood! A must for cooking Chinese food and properly many types of food!
customer_reviews.author: txdjltao

customer_reviews.title: Best hood I have had! Quite & powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot be happier with this product! Quiet and modern looking. Great lighting. A hugh boon to our kitchen! Highly recommend it with all our hearts!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Y.

customer_reviews.title: strong suction!
customer_reviews.text: I like its appearance very much. It is easy to clean and has great suction. There is no smell of oil and smoke in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Chongliang Bi

customer_reviews.title: Wish I purchased this earlier!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a powerful range hood and this one works great! I wish I purchased this range hood earlier. It looks nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful,  easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We installed by ourselves after watch the install video couple times. Not too hard to install at all, just need make sure you have the right tools. Very pretty one match our countertops. Powerful and not too noise. Easy to clean. Recommend friends to buy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Q T

customer_reviews.title: Only thing i’m not sure that if the black color will look better for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting to change to this hood for a while, our old one doesn’t work so well, not strong enough for my cooking, i’m glad that I made the purchase, I wish I could bought sooner, overall shipping and installing very fast. The hood work really well, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: HONGWEI XU

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Bought during independent day with promotion. I should have replaced my hanging microwave with Fotile range hood as soon as I moved in to keep my kitchen from oil. So far, i’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Day one of usage after self installation. Way quieter than the old Ikea one, yet quite powerful. So far no complaints. Took some preparations for the job, but the installation itself was straightforward. YOU NEED two persons.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: installing it was pretty smoothly. My wife loves this product very much
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Range Hood to replace our old one in September. With my son’s help, installing it was pretty smoothly. My wife loves this product very much. Thanks for FOTILE Amazon team, keep good work people! Wish you guys the best!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The engine is powerful and good quality! So easy to clean! I like it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the best range hood ever!!! i love it! and also the customer service is great!

customer_reviews.title: Suction is great!
customer_reviews.text: Does make chinese-dish-cooking enjoyable. The suction is great! It is kind of heavy to install. Have not cleaned it yet. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: yimin chen

customer_reviews.title: Friends said it is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 6 months ago,it is so pretty and does work well,room is fresh,really enjoy cooking now,love it so much.

customer_reviews.title: Fotile is a very good choice, strong power and less noises
customer_reviews.text: Fotile is a very good choice,strong power and less noises.

customer_reviews.title: The range hood of the future
customer_reviews.text: I love this range hood! It has the strongest suction power I've ever seen. And it's sleek and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Haney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: We got in last sale and installed today. Very straightforward installation and works pretty well. We exceeded 0.5 inch beyond given max hood top to stove top distance 32.5 inch but still works pretty well on medium fan. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: yahaha

customer_reviews.title: Better than ever
customer_reviews.text: I owned it for a year, it is good when you go home you don’t have to smell all the stuff for dinner! Fotile makes your kitchen cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: hz

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Little bit of work to install the unit since I had to open a hole on the wall 😄. Otherwise this unit works perfectly. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lu

customer_reviews.title: Best hood we have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Installation needs some attention to detail. Once installed, the hood works perfectly, suction is great and clean up is straightforward. Cooking smells no longer linger and waft in to the rest of house ( central air condition ). This is a 30 day review.

customer_reviews.title: Nice working
customer_reviews.text: nice job and cool design, my mom like it so much

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and seller! just got it installed today! Thank you Fotile! Thank you for those masks! I wish I can upload some pictures!

customer_reviews.title: Great range hood
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is the great design and also a powerful product, especially for fry food. Hight Recommended for all families. Really like this touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amylulu

customer_reviews.title: Want a range hood? choose FOTILE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two range hoods last year. There are Chinese and English manuals, the installation is quite simple, I am done by myself. Sure enough, the high-end grade! Strong horsepower, low noise, easy to clean, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: lxs

customer_reviews.title: Tong Zhang

product_meta.title: FOTILE JQG7501.E 30" Range Hood | Unique Side-Draft Design for Under Cabinet or Wall Mount | Modern Kitchen Vent Hood | Powerful Motor | LED Lights | Onxy Black Tempered Glass Surface
feature_bullets: SIDE-DRAFT RANGE HOOD: Unique Side-Draft design will lead cooking fumes to the air inlet, reduce cooking fumes from spreading. With 90° automatic open baffle plate, it can cover 6 ft² of range space.
POWERFUL DUAL MOTORS: With one touch, it will reach 380 Pa velocity with 58dB noise level, as the vent hood efficiently removes cooking fumes, smell from your kitchen.

TOUCH SCREEN CONTROL: With 3 Speed Settings, it is suitable for all kinds of cooking style. With Delay Function, it will ensure no smell will be left behind after you finished cooking, while you enjoy your meal with your family. With Screen Lock Function, it prevents you from turn on the hood will cleaning the surface.

EASY TO MAINTAIN: Special impeller design in this range hood achieves 92% separation of grease and fumes. All the grease will drip into our large grease tray. Grease tray and oil filter are easy to remove.

HASSLE-FREE INSTALLATION: We offer professional installation services (additional charge) in over 50 major cities, such as San Francisco, Los Angeles, and New York City. Reach out today and see if we are in your area. BEST in the INDUSTRY WARRANTY SERVICES: With over 3,500 independent service providers network covering 50 states.

specifications.Special Features: Screen Lock Function, Touch Screen, Automatic Baffle Plate
